full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Snow Removal and Ice Control Services**

**Procurement Details**

* **Title (English)**: ITT_E0224-240736 Snow Removal and Ice Control Services – Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre, St. John’s, NL
* **Title (French)**: IÀS_E0224-240736 – Services de déneigement et de déglaçage – Centre des pêches de l’Atlantique nord-ouest (St. John’s, Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador)
* **Reference Number**: WS4228101726-Doc4264914462
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4228101726

**Procurement Status**

* **Closing Date**: Thursday, November 2, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Procurement Status**: Expired

**Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada requires Snow Removal and Ice Control services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Delivery Location**

* **Newfoundland and Labrador**

**Services Required**

The successful bidder shall furnish all necessary labour, supervision, materials and equipment to provide snow removal and ice control services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre.

**Notice Information**

* **Link to Tender**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17755993?extsite=MTc3NTU5OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Contact**: Gary Bryant (SPAC/PSPC), gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Procurement Documents**

* **Attachment**: None

**Additional Information**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) adheres to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) Mitchell. You seem to have done an excellent job of rewriting the original text...
